name: test-weaver
description: Multi-stack user management system with Node.js API and React applications

scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix nodejs-application && npm install --prefix react-19-application && npm install --prefix react-18-application
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:react19" "npm run dev:react18"
scripts.build:all: npm run build --prefix react-19-application && npm run build --prefix react-18-application
